thread.title: City Snapshot: Adnams falls during "long cold spring"

title: City Snapshot: Adnams falls during "long cold spring"
text:
04 Aug 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Adnams beer volumes fell 5% in the first half as the rapid evolution of the craft beer market posed a threat to its traditional English bitters Available to members only
